sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT MAX(B_UPDDATE) as MAX_B_UPDDATE FROM @{pipeline().parameters.Sink_Dma_Table_Name} WITH(NOLOCK)
SELECT COUNT(1) as data FROM GD_ENTERPRISE_REF_DMA WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Dma_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'

SELECT 
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'@{pipeline().parameters.Dma_Class_Name}' as B_CLASSNAME,
ENTERPRISE_REF_DMA_ID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_BATCHID,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDDATE,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
DMA_REGION
FROM GD_ENTERPRISE_REF_DMA WITH(NOLOCK) 
WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Dma_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'
SELECT MAX(B_UPDDATE) as MAX_B_UPDDATE FROM @{pipeline().parameters.Sink_Time_Zone_EFF_DT_Table_Name} WITH(NOLOCK)
SELECT COUNT(1) as data FROM GD_ENT_REF_TIME_ZONE_EFF_DT WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Time_Zone_EFF_DT_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'

SELECT 
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'@{pipeline().parameters.Time_Zone_EFF_DT_Class_Name}' as B_CLASSNAME,
ENT_REF_TIME_ZN_EFF_DT_ID,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDDATE,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
TIME_ZONE_EFFECTIVE_YEAR,
DST_START_DT,
DST_END_DT,
F_ENTERPRISE_REF_TIME_ZONE
FROM GD_ENT_REF_TIME_ZONE_EFF_DT WITH(NOLOCK) 
WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Time_Zone_EFF_DT_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'
SELECT MAX(B_UPDDATE) as MAX_B_UPDDATE FROM @{pipeline().parameters.Sink_Time_Zone_Table_Name} WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT 
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,

B_UPDDATE,

UTC_OFFSET_STD,
UTC_OFFSET_DST

WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Time_Zone_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'

SELECT MAX(SRC_UPDATE) AS MaxDate FROM [dbo].[SD_COMMUNICTN_PREFERNC_EMAIL] WITH(NOLOCK)
SELECT MAX(SRC_UPDATE) AS MaxDate FROM [dbo].[SD_COMMUNICTN_PREFERNC_PHONE] WITH(NOLOCK)
SELECT COUNT(1) as Count FROM [Masterdata_CDP].[InitialLoadCommPrefEmail] WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE B_CREDATE>'@{activity('SD_COMMUNICTN_PREFERNC_EMAIL_MaxDate').output.firstRow.MaxDate}'
SELECT COUNT(1) as Count FROM [Masterdata_CDP].[InitialLoadCommPrefPhone] WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE B_CREDATE>'@{activity('SD_COMMUNICTN_PREFERNC_PHONE_MaxDate').output.firstRow.MaxDate}'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT EmailAddress AS RAW_EMAIL_ADDRESS,
CAST(OptedIn as bit) AS OPTED_IN,
Organization AS ORGANIZATION,
Purpose AS PURPOSE,
Channel AS CHANNEL,
B_SourceID AS B_SOURCEID,
EmailCommunicationId AS EMAIL_COMMUNICATION_ID,
SRC_UPDATE,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
B_UPDATE AS B_UPDDATE,
B_CREDATE FROM [Masterdata_CDP].[InitialLoadCommPrefEmail] WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE SRC_UPDATE>'@{activity('SD_COMMUNICTN_PREFERNC_EMAIL_MaxDate').output.firstRow.MaxDate}'

SELECT PhoneNumber AS RAW_PHONE_NUMBER,
CAST(OptedIn AS Bit) AS OPTED_IN,
Organization AS ORGANIZATION,
Purpose AS PURPOSE,
Channel AS CHANNEL,
B_SourceID AS B_SOURCEID,
PhoneCommunicationId AS PHONE_COMM_ID,
SRC_UPDATE,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
B_UPDATE AS B_UPDDATE,
B_CREDATE FROM [Masterdata_CDP].[InitialLoadCommPrefPhone] WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE SRC_UPDATE>'@{activity('SD_COMMUNICTN_PREFERNC_PHONE_MaxDate').output.firstRow.MaxDate}'

DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_CustomerMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'CommunicationPreferenceLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'CommunicationPreferenceLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_CustomerMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'CommunicationPreferenceLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'CommunicationPreferenceLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

SELECT EmailAddress AS RAW_EMAIL_ADDRESS,
CAST(OptedIn as bit) AS OPTED_IN,
Organization AS ORGANIZATION,
Purpose AS PURPOSE,
Channel AS CHANNEL,
B_SourceID AS B_SOURCEID,
EmailCommunicationId AS EMAIL_COMMUNICATION_ID,
SRC_UPDATE,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
B_UPDATE AS B_UPDDATE,
B_CREDATE FROM [Masterdata_CDP].[InitialLoadCommPrefEmail] WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ChunkNumber = @{activity('Get_Email_Chunk').output.firstRow.ChunkNumber} and TableName = '@{activity('Get_Email_Chunk').output.firstRow.TableName}' and Organization = '@{activity('Get_Email_Chunk').output.firstRow.Organization}' and channel = 'email'

SELECT PhoneNumber AS RAW_PHONE_NUMBER,
CAST(OptedIn AS Bit) AS OPTED_IN,
Organization AS ORGANIZATION,
Purpose AS PURPOSE,
Channel AS CHANNEL,
B_SourceID AS B_SOURCEID,
PhoneCommunicationId AS PHONE_COMM_ID,
SRC_UPDATE,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
B_UPDATE AS B_UPDDATE,
B_CREDATE FROM [Masterdata_CDP].[InitialLoadCommPrefPhone] WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ChunkNumber = @{activity('Get_Phone_Chunk').output.firstRow.ChunkNumber} and TableName = '@{activity('Get_Phone_Chunk').output.firstRow.TableName}' and Organization = '@{activity('Get_Phone_Chunk').output.firstRow.Organization}' and channel = 'Phone'

WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE customerMasterId<='@{pipeline().parameters.HomesSacramento}'

DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_CustomerMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'RetailCustomerLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'RetailCustomerLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'masterDataHub_Retail'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'ExternalRefCountryLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'External Ref Country Load'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID
      ,[EXT_REF_COUNTRY_ID]
       ,'ExternalRefCountry' as B_CLASSNAME
      ,[COUNTRY_CODE_A2]
      ,[COUNTRY_CODE_A3]
      ,[COUNTRY_NAME]
      ,[COUNTRY_LOCAL_NAME]
      ,[COUNTRY_UN_CODE]
  FROM [ISO].[countrycode]

EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'masterDataHub_Retail'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'ExternalRefUSStateLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'External Ref US State Load'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID
      ,'ExternalRefUSState' as B_CLASSNAME
      ,[EXT_REF_US_STATE_ID]
      ,[STATE_CODE]
      ,[STATE_NAME]
  FROM [ISO].[statecode]
